holidays.title: Respect Your Cat Day
holidays.description: It's time to acknowledge all the hard work your cat puts into being your loyal companion.

holidays.title: Barnum & Bailey Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the Greatest Show on Earth, and the greatest circus to ever exist.

holidays.title: Eat an Eskimo Pie Day
holidays.description: Grab a delicious bar of chocolate-coated vanilla ice cream to celebrate Eat an Eskimo Pie Day!

holidays.title: Holy Thursday
holidays.description: Holy Thursday is an annual religious event that commemorates the Last Supper of Christ.

holidays.title: Major League Baseball Opening Day
holidays.description: Every year thousands of people call in sick so they can be in the seats when the first pitch is thrown.

holidays.title: National Amber Day
holidays.description: Make the most of this special day to demonstrate how much you adore and respect Ambers.

holidays.title: National Black Forest Cake Day
holidays.description: Did you know? The cake was originally a simple dessert with cream, cherries, chocolate, and alcohol.

holidays.title: National Hot Tub Day
holidays.description: Relax in the hot tub during this holiday to relieve stress and get other benefits.

holidays.title: National Ram Day
holidays.description: Ram is one of the most common names found in the Middle East and India.

holidays.title: National Something On a Stick Day
holidays.description: There’s no getting around it, food on a stick is fun.

holidays.title: National Triglycerides Day
holidays.description: Triglyceride levels, are important lipid compounds which provide us with energy, can be extremely detrimental.

holidays.title: National Weed Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Some weeds are actually beneficial for us and our ecosystem.

holidays.title: Serfs’ Emancipation Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate the history of this day and discover why it is significant.

holidays.title: Virtual Advocacy Day
holidays.description: Get involved with the legislative process impacting a cause you care deeply about.

holidays.title: World Piano Day
holidays.description: Get your favorite sheet music out as we celebrate the king of musical instruments.

holidays.title: Lady Gaga’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about this American icon and infuse some of her creativity into your day.

holidays.title: Caleb Coffee’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is an incredible social media rockstar who achieved his fame by making jokes!

holidays.title: Jackson Wang’s Birthday
holidays.description: This triple threat is constantly surprising his fans with his insatiable drive and versatility.

holidays.title: Kate Gosselin’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this fabulous mother of eight and successful reality star, no challenge is too big!

holidays.title: Reba McEntire’s Birthday
holidays.description: For the accomplished country singer, life hasn’t always been a bed of roses.

holidays.title: Vince Vaughn’s Birthday
holidays.description: The life of Vince Vaughn is full of glitz, glamor, ups, and downs.
